libs.uow_tool_belt.general_tools.parallelize¶

libs.uow_tool_belt.general_tools.parallelize(f, args=None, kwargs=None, nprocs=None)¶
Parameters:

  • f (function,) – e.g. with calling signature (A, B, C=None, D=None)

  • args (iterable,) – list of inputs for function, e.g. [(a1, b1), (a2, b2), (a3, b3)]

  • kwargs (iterable,) – list of inputs for function, e.g. [{‘C’:20, ‘D’:25}, {‘C’:30, ‘D’:40}]

  • nprocs (int,) – number of processes to create. If None, max number of processes.

Mercury
